originalText.text: I have been working with Dr. Mazlin for over 3 years now and I really cannot see me going to anyone else.  He is so caring, patient, understanding, thorough, over such a well rounded professional.  I absolutely love him and really feel at ease when i come and see him.  No matter what office he moves to, i will always go to him!

text.text: I have been working with Dr. Mazlin for over 3 years now and I really cannot see me going to anyone else.  He is so caring, patient, understanding, thorough, over such a well rounded professional.  I absolutely love him and really feel at ease when i come and see him.  No matter what office he moves to, i will always go to him!

originalText.text: When I first met Dr. Mazlin, I was very reluctant to see him. However, when I met him, he met me feel at ease and had answers to my questions, that I’d been asking for years, without an adequate answer. When I asked him my question, not only did he give me an explanation that I was able to understand, he drew an illustration, so that he was able to make sure that I understood him. That act alone spoke volumes to me. I’m thankful for that and I’m totally comfortable seeing him.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Jeffrey Mazlin for over 25 years. He saved my life on a couple of occasions. No matter where Dr. Mazlin goes I always will follow him.  He is the best OBGYN ever. Knowledgeable, personable, caring , perfesssional and just an over compassionate person. I HIGHLY recommend Dr. Jeffrey Mazlin.  There is no other.

originalText.text: Dr. Mazlin is amazing!  I have been going to him for over 20 years & he exemplifies the qualities a doctor should have: caring, knowledgeable, relatable, & honest. I strongly reccomend him as a Doctor!

originalText.text: I have been a patient for over 8 years. I have never met a more caring, patient, knowledgable doctor. his staff is amazing and kind and professional and i would recommend him to anyone. he is the best
